network.badCertificate: The server certificate is not valid. Please check the server's security certificate and try again.
network.badRequest: The request was not formatted correctly and could not be understood. Please check the request format and try again.
network.badResponse: The server responded with an unexpected format or status code. Please check the response and try again.
network.clientError: A client error occurred. Please check the request and try again.
network.connection: Failed to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and try again.
network.connectionTimeout: The connection timed out while attempting to reach the server. Please check your network settings and try again.
network.forbidden: The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. Please check your permissions and try again.
network.internalServer: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. Please try again later.
network.noNetwork: No network connection. Please check your internet connection and try again.
network.notFound: The requested resource could not be found. Please check the URL and try again.
network.receiveTimeout: The server took too long to send a response. Please check your connection and try again.
network.requestCancel: The request was cancelled. Please check your request and try again.
network.requestTimeout: The server timed out waiting for the request. Please attempt to reconnect and try again.
network.sendTimeout: The request timed out while trying to send data. Please check your connection and try again.
network.serverError: The server encountered a condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request. Please try again later.
network.timeout: The network request timed out. Please check your connection and try again.
network.tooManyRequests: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time. Please wait before trying again.
network.unauthorized: Authentication is required and has failed or has not been provided. Please verify your credentials and try again.
network.unexpected: An unexpected network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
network.unexpectedTokenRefresh: An unexpected error occurred while refreshing the authentication token. Please re-authenticate and try again.
